title: Saint Paul's Church National Historic Site: Accessibility
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility             Accessibility       The museum building, or visitors' center, at St. Paul's Church N.H.S. is handicap accessible.A ramp at the front entrance provides access to the front door.Inside the museum, ample space exists to maneuver through the exhibition areas;just please be careful around the display cases.The public bathrooms are handicap accessible.A three step marble staircase provides entrance to the historic church.The site stores and possesses a portable ramp to provide handicap entrance into the church, but it is normally not in place.Please call in advance to notify staff you will be visiting and would require the ramp in place.The five acre historic cemetery includes uneven ground and can be difficult for wheelchair or walker maneuverability.We usually advise a limited tour of the historic cemetery. Fortunately, the section directly behind the church is fairly even and contains some of the most interesting and historically significant features of the burial yard, one of the nation's oldest.
